definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
chicken cholera (caused by Pasteurella multocida or P. avicida)/fowl cholera

sentences.english: Two cases of cholera, one of which has ended fatally, have occurred here.
sentences.chinese: 这里发生过两起霍乱病例，其中一人已经死亡。

sentences.english: Vibrio cholerae 01 sero type inaba has been confirmed in some of the affected areas.
sentences.chinese: 在有些疫区已确认存在01稻叶血清型霍乱弧菌。

sentences.english: The children were vaccinated against cholera.
sentences.chinese: 那些小孩接受了霍乱预防注射。

sentences.english: Cholera was recognized as an indicator of how well the environment is managed.
sentences.chinese: 霍乱被视为可衡量环境治理成果的一项指标。

sentences.english: WHO is deeply concerned about the cholera outbreak in Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织深切关注海地的霍乱疫情。

sentences.english: An outbreak of cholera in Haiti continues to spread sickness and worry.
sentences.chinese: 海地霍乱爆发仍在继续传播疾病和忧虑。

sentences.english: So far 796 people have died of cholera in Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 至今海地已有796人死于霍乱。

sentences.english: The disease is caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae.
In both states, Vibrio cholerae has been laboratory confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 在这两个州，霍乱弧菌已经实验室确认。

sentences.english: delivering medicines and other health equipment to health centres treating cholera patients.
sentences.chinese: 向收治霍乱患者的各医疗点提供了药物和设备。

sentences.english: Mintz says it may be impossible to determine exactly where the Haitian strain came from.
sentences.chinese: 明茨说，很难确定海地霍乱菌种究竟来自何处。

sentences.english: The cholera outbreak has been contained.
sentences.chinese: 霍乱的爆发已被遏制住。

sentences.english: He cites the pork industry, which used to be blighted with hog cholera.
sentences.chinese: 他列举了曾因猪霍乱而萎靡不振的养猪业。

sentences.english: Cholera and typhus outbreaks are common.
sentences.chinese: 霍乱和斑疹伤寒都时常发生。

sentences.english: The Queen blames the Tories for everything, from ingrowing toenails to cholera.
sentences.chinese: 从趾甲倒生到霍乱，女王把大事小事都归咎于保守党。

sentences.english: Cholera remains an ever-present risk in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 在许多国家，霍乱仍然是一种经常存在的危险。

pinyin: gou1 duan1 luo2 xuan2 ti3 bing4
